title: Multi-Profile Authentication Success
description: Verify that users can authenticate successfully for each profile (Gestor, Hospital, Médico, Paciente) and are redirected to the correct dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid credentials for Gestor profile
Select Gestor profile from profile selection
Click login button
Verify redirection to Municipal Dashboard with Gestor KPIs visible
Logout and repeat login for Hospital profile
Enter valid credentials for Hospital profile
Select Hospital profile and login
Verify redirection to Hospital Dashboard with leitos and faturamento management
Logout and repeat login for Médico profile
Enter valid credentials for Médico profile
Select Médico profile and login
Verify access to geriatric care modules and telemedicine session management
Logout and repeat login for Paciente profile
Enter valid credentials for Paciente profile
Select Paciente profile and login
Verify access to personal medical history and preventive guidance

title: Multi-Profile Authentication Failure
description: Verify system behavior when incorrect credentials are entered or profile selection is invalid.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid username and password
Attempt login
Check that login is denied with error message
Enter valid credentials but do not select profile
Attempt login
Check for prompt to select a profile before login

title: Municipal Dashboard KPIs Display and Update
description: Verify that Municipal Dashboard loads correctly, displays KPIs SUS, graphs and updates data in real-time for gestores municipais.

steps.description: Login as Gestor profile
Verify dashboard loads with all KPIs and indicators visible
Verify graphs and metrics data correspond to latest available data
Trigger update of KPIs by data refresh
Verify KPIs data refreshes within 2 seconds and displays updated values
Change dashboard theme to dark mode with glassmorphism
Verify UI theme applies correctly without display issues

title: Hospital Dashboard Functional Testing
description: Verify Hospital Dashboard loads and allows management of leitos, faturamento and shows analytic reports correctly.

steps.description: Login as Hospital profile
Verify dashboard loads with leitos and faturamento modules
Navigate to Gestão Farmacêutica page
Verify pharmaceutical inventory and controls are visible and functional
Navigate to Relatórios Analytics and Analises Laboratoriais
Confirm analytic charts display correct hospital performance data

title: ERP Hospital Integration with Philips Tasy and SOUL MV
description: Verify integration with 12 ERP hospital systems including connectivity, data fetch, and error handling with Philips Tasy and SOUL MV.

steps.description: Access ERP Integration page
Configure connection for Philips Tasy system
Verify that data from Philips Tasy loads successfully with response time < 500ms
Configure connection for SOUL MV system
Verify that data from SOUL MV loads successfully within performance limits
Simulate API failure for one ERP system
Check that error rate remains below 1% and user receives clear error notification

title: Integration with DATASUS API Services
description: Verify system integration with 16 API DATASUS services, including data retrieval, error handling, and compliance with expected response times.

steps.description: Access DATASUS Integration technical page
Trigger calls to all 16 DATASUS API services
Verify all API calls succeed with error rate under 1% and response times under 500ms
Simulate network timeout for a DATASUS API
Verify system handles timeout gracefully and logs appropriate audit entry

title: e-SUS APS Integration Configuration and Orchestration
description: Verify complete integration with e-SUS APS via LEDI and DW PEC including all 8 configuration sections and orchestration via MCP Server.

steps.description: Navigate to e-SUS APS Integration page
Complete configuration for all 8 sections correctly
Verify orchestration triggers calls via MCP Server and data synchronizes successfully
Submit invalid configuration in one section
Verify system detects error and prevents saving invalid configurations

title: Geriatric Care System Module Access and Functionality
description: Verify the 7 geriatric care modules (Diabetes, Osteoporose, etc.) load and display relevant clinical protocols correctly for medical professionals.

steps.description: Login as Médico profile
Sequentially access each geriatric care module
Verify clinical protocols, patient data, and care suggestions display correctly
Test data input and protocol updates
Verify data validation and saving works without errors

title: Epidemic Alert System Notification and Mapping
description: Verify that epidemic alerts generate automatically, display correct risk maps and indicators by neighborhood, and send notifications personalized per user profile.

steps.description: Login as any profile with alert subscription
Verify risk maps load with correct color-coded risk levels
Verify user-specific alerts panel shows relevant notifications
Trigger simulated epidemiological event
Verify automatic alert notification is received and displayed promptly

title: Responsive Navigation Sidebar and Layout per Profile
description: Verify that navigation menus, sidebar, and layouts adapt responsively and dynamically according to user profile and screen size.

steps.description: Login as each profile type
Verify sidebar shows correct menu items per profile
Resize browser window to mobile size
Verify sidebar collapses and navigation remains usable
Resize window back to desktop
Verify sidebar and layout adapt back correctly without UI glitches

title: Telemedicine Session Management Functionality
description: Verify telemedicine system modal allows scheduling, managing, and conducting consultations without errors.

steps.description: Login as Médico or Paciente profile
Open telemedicine modal and schedule a new consultation
Verify consultation details are saved and appear in session list
Start a scheduled teleconsultation session
Verify communication modal opens with expected controls
End teleconsultation
Verify session is marked completed and stored in history

title: Security Compliance with LGPD and RBAC Access Control
description: Verify the system implements data encryption, audit logs, and role-based access control according to LGPD compliance requirements.

steps.description: Login as different user roles
Try accessing restricted resources unauthorized for that role
Verify access denied with appropriate user feedback
Trigger data operations and check that audit logs are generated
Verify audit logs capture user, action, timestamp, and affected data
Inspect data storage and transmissions to verify encryption is active
Confirm encrypted storage and secure network communications

title: Internationalization and Language Switching
description: Verify system supports full internationalization with correct translations and UI layout for PT, EN, ES, and FR languages.

steps.description: Login and access any major page with UI text
Switch language to English (EN)
Verify all UI text and labels are accurately translated
Switch language to Spanish (ES) and French (FR) sequentially
Verify complete and correct translations in each language
Check UI layout for text overflow or truncation in all languages
Verify no layout breaks or alignment issues occur

title: Performance and Load Testing
description: Verify system maintains response times under 2 seconds and availability above 99.9% under expected user load.

steps.description: Simulate concurrent user logins with mixed profiles
Verify authentication and dashboard loading times remain under 2 seconds
Execute data refresh and integration calls with load
Verify system availability does not drop below 99.9% during peak usage
Simulate unexpected peak traffic spikes
Verify system handles spikes gracefully without crashes and recovers stability quickly

title: Public Health Management Tools Functional Test
description: Verify tools for capacitação de gestores, transição de gestão and indicadores de desempenho APS load data correctly and support user interactions.

steps.description: Login as Gestor profile
Access Capacitacao Gestores and load available training programs
Verify trainings display details and user can register
Navigate to Transicao Gestao and configure transition data
Verify data saves and reflects correctly in dependent fields
Access Indicadores Desempenho APS and load performance indicators
Verify indicator charts are accurate and update on user interaction
